net.hockeyapp.android.internal
Class DownloadFileListener

java.lang.Object
  net.hockeyapp.android.StringListener
      net.hockeyapp.android.internal.DownloadFileListener

public abstract class DownloadFileListener
extends StringListener

Description

Abstract class for callbacks to be invoked from the DownloadFileTask.
